chapters.title: The Aspirant Archer
chapters.description: Ekalavya, a tribal prince, aspired to learn archery and approached Guru Dronacharya for guidance.

chapters.title: The Self-Taught Student
chapters.description: Upon being rejected by Drona, Ekalavya crafted a statue of the guru and practiced diligently in front of it.

chapters.title: Mastery Recognized
chapters.description: Ekalavya became an exceptional archer and impressed Drona with his skills during a demonstration.

chapters.title: The Sacrificial Guru Dakshina
chapters.description: When Drona asked for his thumb as guru dakshina, Ekalavya willingly sacrificed it, demonstrating unparalleled devotion.
